company_description:
FireStar exists to light the fires of enthusiasm and to teach others to keep them burning.  We offer motivational speaking and training in a variety of areas including customer service, communication, leadership, and dealing with change.

Two of our most popular programs:

Motivation by Chocolate

This session features two things everyone likes â€“ chocolate and motivation!  It teaches nine key motivational concepts that can help participants get more out of every day â€“ both personally and professionally.  They'll learn about persistence, passion, effective allocation of resources, the law of diminishing returns, and much more!  The session includes a chocolate tasting to demonstrate not only how to appreciate chocolate, but life itself.  

How to Communicate with Everyone Who is Not You

Life would be so easy if everyone we interacted with was just like us. They would understand our cryptic e-mail messages, forgive our bizarre text messages, and understand why we unfriended them on Facebook. There would be no hard feelings, no conflict, and clearly, world peace. Unfortunately, no one else is exactly like you and to succeed in life and business, you have to work with the frustrating, the angry, the silly, and yes, even the smarter and more articulate. This session will help you do just that. You will learn about barriers to communication and how to remove them. You'll get tips on defusing hostile people (especially helpful for those in customer service or divorce court). You'll take a communication styles quiz and find out just how different a large portion of the world really is and how to get along with them. There will be tips on technology and how to be more effective when using it to communicate. And you'll even improve your listening skills (not that anyone has better ideas than you, but they might have more information). People won't stop being different, but this session will help you understand them.

company_description:
Best. Job. Ever.

Working at Physique 57 is a lot like taking one of our signature classes- challenging, empowering and there's never a dull moment. We are a group of diverse, savvy, funny, energetic, confident, strong, entrepreneurial individuals working toward a common goal of promoting wellness in body and mind for our clients and our coworkers.

Our commitment to our employees is the same as our commitment to our clients. We provide an environment where it's safe to take risks and think outside the box. Employees are encouraged to push themselves past what they believe they can accomplish. Come work with us and realize your full potential.

Physique 57, an internationally renowned fitness company, is committed to sculpting bodies and changing lives with challenging, invigorating and empowering barre workouts. Its signature 57-minute classes, led by a team of talented expert instructors, guide you through a series of uniquely choreographed exercises in a motivating and energizing group class environment. An innovative and respected leader in the fitness industry, Physique 57 has upscale studios in Manhattan, Dubai, Bangkok and Mumbai. Studio class offerings are complemented by fitness retail boutiques, online workouts, and a widely celebrated book, The Physique 57 Solution, written by co-founders Tanya Becker and Jennifer Vaughan Maanavi. For more information on Physique 57, please visit our website.

Today, Hobby Lobby Stores, Inc., headquartered in Oklahoma City, OK, operates over 1,000 stores across the nation that average 55,000 square feet.  Hobby Lobby is an industry leading retailer offering more than 70,000 arts, crafts, hobbies, home dÃ©cor, Holiday, and seasonal products.  

Hobby Lobby is included in Forbes' annual list of America's largest private companies.  While Hobby Lobby continues to grow steadily, the company carries no long-term debt.

We are always looking for experienced retail managers to join our growing family.  All of our retail managers learn the ropes by starting at the co-manager position.  Promotions to store manager and other senior retail manager positions always come from within the company.   

Applications for our co-manager positions are only accepted online at https://careers.hobbylobby.com/current-openings/store-management/. 

Applications for our non-management retail positions are available at your local Hobby Lobby store.  

We believe that it is by God's grace and provision that Hobby Lobby has endured.  God has been faithful in the past, and we trust Him for our future.

company_description:
Culture Index is a strategic advisory firm that works exclusively with visionary entrepreneurs, business leaders, and management to scale and transform organizations using applied analytics. The Executive Advisors of Culture Index come from positions owning companies and leading teams; they understand people are the leading indicators to business success. Using the tools of Culture Index, companies optimize their people from the ground level up. Whether hiring, managing, or motivating top tier talent, Culture Index is the preeminent solution to maximize success long-term.

Culture Index measures it's client success by their increased revenue and profit, higher employee engagement, lower employee turnover, and overall organizational scalability.

The Culture Index approach is simple and straight forward. The primary focus of Culture Index is to guide companies down a path to powerful culture through the following steps:

ASSESS 
A quick, yet comprehensive survey is completed within a unique, online company access account. This survey takes approximately 7-10 minutes and provides companies with data measuring seven work-related personality traits.

TRANSLATE
The data from the survey is available to company leaders and managers within the company access account. Support on translating the results comes from an Executive Advisor who assists leaders and managers in creating change and results within the organization.

MOBILIZE
Culture Index is in the knowledge transfer business and therefore teaches client leaders and managers how to make the data actionable. With unlimited access to a dedicated Executive Advisor, clients mobilize the data available for immediate results and long-term success.

Top performing organizations require real data to make real decisions. That includes decisions on their people.

Wonders Press is a small publisher which will be initially specializing in travel guides to the historic and prehistoric sites of Scotland. The first title in this series of three regional guidebooks  -- WONDERS OF SOUTHERN SCOTLAND -- was published in March 2014 and is now available at major online booksellers. For details of  this guide to 35 top historic & prehistoric sites, go to www.WondersOfSouthernScotland.com. 
 
The series of three guidebooks covers Southern Scotland, Central & Northern Scotland, and the Western & Northern Isles of Scotland, respectively. The latter two guides will be published later in 20 14 and in early 2015, respectively.
 
WONDERS OF SOUTHERN SCOTLAND focuses on the extremely interesting history and prehistory of Scotland. The 35 sites are illustrated with a total of over 300 color photos. Maps, floor plans, and GPS info for all sites are also included. The 8.5 x 5.5-inch size makes the guidebook easy to take along on a trip to Scotland. For details on where to eat, stay, or shop, use one of the many fine general guides to Scotland.

company_description:
The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) is a professional membership organization of songwriters, composers and music publishers of every kind of music. ASCAP's mission is to license and promote the music of its members and foreign affiliates, obtain fair compensation for the public performance of their works and to distribute the royalties that it collects based upon those performances. ASCAP members write the world's best-loved music and ASCAP has pioneered the efficient licensing of that music to hundreds of thousands of enterprises who use it to add value to their business - from bars, restaurants and retail, to radio, TV and cable, to Internet, mobile services and more. The ASCAP license offers an efficient solution for businesses to legally perform ASCAP music while respecting the right of songwriters and composers to be paid fairly. With over 925,000 members representing more than 11.5 million copyrighted works, ASCAP is the worldwide leader in performance royalties, service and advocacy for songwriters and composers, and the only American performing rights organization (PRO) owned and governed by its writer and publisher members. 

www.ascap.com

headline: Owner, Writer And Presenter  At Specialized  Educational Experiences And Manager  Of Rehab Therapy Emory Univ Hospital
company_description:
Specialized Educational Experiences is an organization devoted to driving improved healthcare outcomes through the development of allied health courses, treatment tools and patient educational materials.

        I know about the pain you feel and the stress you are under. Through the years, I have recovered from migraines, sacroiliac pain, lumbar pain, thoracic pain, neck pain, knee pain and nerve pain in my arms and legs. I've broken numerous bones. I have had severe food allergies, insomnia, and sleep apnea. I have made it through liver disease, gallbladder disease and irritable bowel syndrome. Doing so has forced me to personally deal with a veritable spectrum of physical pain. Aside from dealing with my own issues, I have devoted the better part of my life to improving others' quality of life.

        For the past 39 years, I have been a Physical Therapist at Emory University Hospital in Atlanta, Georgia, where I get to "pick the brains" of some incredible physicians and scientists. For the past 34 years, I have taught physical therapy courses throughout the country with a very gifted group of therapists. Daily, I care for patients of every diagnosis, but my focus is the rehabilitation of people who have not yet been able to control and/or resolve their pain.

       Through the summation of my life events and experiences, including all the people I've been able to help, I am convinced of three fundamental truths: (1) the power to overcome a challenge lies in your determination to do so; (2) your success lies in clearly understanding all the variables; and (3) without an organized, well executed and dynamic battle plan, your chances of success rapidly declines.

       Please join me in an exploration of your pain experience, the reasons why your pain hasn't stopped and about developing a winning battle plan to take back your life.  You have the potential to live a very different life.  Let our collection of books and booklets show you the way.

company_description:
Are you looking for a death doula? Perhaps some end-of-life support for you or a loved one? Maybe you're simply interested in planning ahead? Or do you want educational programming for your community that helps people deal with death anxiety or learn more about how to ensure a good death?

We are available to help take the pressure off of you. We assist and serve different needs so that you can focus on loved ones. Or simply learn more to die a better death and live a better life. 

Anitya Doula Services serves in Chicago and everywhere. We do this privately and confidentially. In person or remotely.

What does a doula do?
Firstly, we offer non-medical, compassionate care. Often we serve those facing the end-of-life, partnering with support provided by other sources. For example, this support can include hospice, comfort care, and each client's own network.

We understand common conditions and diseases. This includes pain management practices. Also, we understand the dying process and helpful ways to ease suffering. Above all, we provide unconditional positive regard and no judgments. We do this while engaging in open talks with clients.

Doula services we provide:
Death educational programming
Writing your life story
Writing your obituary, eulogy, and social media posts
Creating advance care directives
Companioning through the end-of-life process
Care coordination
Pre-planning for funeral or memorial service
Connecting you with appropriate local resources
Qualified and reliable respite care
Coordinating visits between clients and loved ones
Guided imagery and meditation
and so much more...

Who do we serve?
We serve and welcome all.

In addition, Anitya Doula Services is proudly anti-racist. We are also an ally organization to the historically underserved. This includes members of the LGBTQ+, POC, Deaf and Disabled communities.
